kubernetes_role.description: A role contains rules that represent a set of permissions. Permissions are purely additive (there are no “deny” rules).

metadata.description: Standard role's metadata. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#metadata)

rule.description: List of rules that define the set of permissions for this role. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/rbac/)
